ai-atk-s0403a32:1_0: Fruits on the Fruit of Non-Returner
ai-atk-s0403a32:2_1: and the seventh of the one without faith arose.
ai-atk-s0403a32:2_4: In the third kind of bodily conduct is supreme behaviour, that is to say, possessed of good behaviour,
ai-atk-s0403a32:2_5: In the training, seeking the trainees,
ai-atk-s0403a32:2_6: Ethical virtue: the four great practices.
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_1: Fourth: At the fortnight of the Community, the monastery,
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_2: Equanimity is in countless ways: “One who takes the numbers,” and he does so in deliberately.
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_4: That is the sign of one’s mind, whose mind is concentrated, looks at it.
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_5: Views of right view, ~ one who has right view,
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_6: (Whoever) concentration and fruition, concentration and fruition,
ai-atk-s0403a32:4_8: which leads to quenching, is extinguishment.
ai-atk-s0403a32:6_1: Your mind is easy to admonish, having become very hard to develop.
ai-atk-s0403a32:6_3: Respect the Teacher’s voice, being guarded:
ai-atk-s0403a32:8_1: There is no sixth Corrupt in the sixth year, without defilements,
ai-atk-s0403a32:8_3: don’t get enough food and drink that they’ve got the repulsion.
ai-atk-s0403a32:8_4: One day, through the power of the river he does not attain state,
ai-atk-s0403a32:10_3: for the sake of the one’s own sake.
ai-atk-s0403a32:10_4: the purification of the way is purified, and so on.
ai-atk-s0403a32:10_5: Doing what is unfinished, not practiced, and what is not good,
ai-atk-s0403a32:10_6: Doing what is unsuitable, not knowingly, not suitable.
ai-atk-s0403a32:12_3: it is recorded that while the rest is reckoned.
ai-atk-s0403a32:13_0: The commentary on the colour and concomitant’s Once.
ai-atk-s0403a32:14_1: In the ninth very same way you haven’t truly seen clearly with right wisdom that defilements are corrupted by defilements, or the drawbacks of what is seen, heard, thought, known, sought, and explored by the mind.
ai-atk-s0403a32:15_0: The seventh sub-chapter on deities is finished.
